summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing the sale to Westinghouse Electric & Manufacturing Company of Two Hundred and Twenty-five Thousand Dollars ($225,000.00) of the Municipal Light And Power Bonds authorized by Ordinance No. 42495; prescribing the interest rate thereon, the maturity dates, denominations, and series designation thereof; and repealing all ordinances and parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
